author: pburba
msg: On the issue-3975 branch: If a merge adds a path with explicit mergeinfo,
then record mergeinfo on that path which describes the merge itself.
Note: This can result in self-referential mergeinfo and/or mergeinfo
describing non-existent merge sources.  The fixes for those problems are
merge when an added path has its own explicit mergeinfo.
reflect that we now record mergeinfo on an incoming add with its own

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4249: Camel now check if managed object has Spring JMX annotations and use those, if not it fallback and use the default from camel-core.

author: slebresne
msg: Fix assertion error during compaction of counter CFs
patch by slebresne; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-2968
